topicTitle: Official Blacklist Request Template [READ BEFORE REPORTING]

posts.postText:
Thank you for helping us keep Jailbreak fun and fair.   

Before creating a new topic in this section requesting prevention of a particular player from becoming a Guard on our Jailbreak server, copy the template below and paste it into your post with all your corresponding information.

>> 
1)  Offender's name: 
2)  Offender's SteamID: 
3)  Explain the situation in detail:  
4)  Were any specific server rules broken: 
5)  When did this/has this been occuring: 
6)  Any staff members on the server at the time of the offence(s): 
7)  Proof: 
 
   BUT WAIT...  
What is considered proof? The only methods of proof we will accept are either a  screenshot or a video  clearly showing the rule-breaker in action, or displaying  undeniable evidence  of what the rule-breaker did. 

   THIS IS IMPORTANT...  
Posting in a blacklist request that you aren't directly involved in will not be tolerated. If you are caught attempting to get somebody blacklisted by lying or with fake proof, you will be permanently banned from Jailbreak.
